cms.query.QueryText: SELECT SUM(SKUUnits*cartSKU.CartItemPrice) AS CartTolal FROM COM_ShoppingCart cart INNER JOIN COM_ShoppingCartSKU cartSKU ON cart.ShoppingCartID= cartSKU.ShoppingCartID INNER JOIN COM_SKU sku ON cartSKU.SKUID=sku.SKUID WHERE Cart.ShoppingCartUserID=@ShoppingCartUserID AND Cart.ShoppingCartInventoryType=@ShoppingCartInventoryType AND ShoppingCartCampaignID= CASE WHEN ShoppingCartInventoryType=2 THEN @ShoppingCartCampaignID ELSE 0 END
